pychemia package¶

PyChemia is a python library for automatize atomistic-level calculations. The library provide an API to manipulate structures, store structures and properties in a Mongo database, search for new structures of a given composition, interact with several atomistic simulation codes and visualize atomistic-related data

class pychemia.Version[source]¶

Bases: object

static full_version()[source]¶
pychemia.info()[source]¶
Show basic information about PyChemia, its location and version.
Also information about other libraries used by PyChemia both mandatory and optional
